name: TOWERIWA
description:
2D Tower defense game

Features:

  • Build towers with element properties and upgrade.
  • Kill enemies or sell the placed towers to earn money .
  • 4 different towers with  each tower is vulnerable to each type of enemies.
  • Make sure enemies don't  your enemies doesn't  cross to reach the portal.

Tutorial:

  • To build a tower, click and hold the left mouse button and choose the location to deploy them .(each tower have different price)
  • To win cross 30 waves of enemies and by every wave your enemy will get stronger so make sure to upgrade your towers best way possible.

  Ok so that's it for now Let's Defend .
